    • Method Detail

      • applyTabularSettings

        public static java.io.InputStream applyTabularSettings(java.io.InputStream fileInputStream,
                                                       FileRequestOptions fileRequestOptions)
        Parses a csv file using the given request options. For example, the number of rows to provide, which row to start from, and which columns to include. To be converted to a stream, the rows must be stored as one String, which limits the length of the response to Integer.MAX_VALUE.
        Parameters:
        fileInputStream - input stream of the csv file
        fileRequestOptions - number of rows, start row, and column indices to be used
        Returns:
        an input stream that only includes the requested information as a csv

      • parseHeaders

        public static java.util.Set<Header> parseHeaders(MetaFile metaFile,
                                                 java.io.InputStream inputStream)
        Parses header row to determine type and index of each header.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - input stream to file being parsed
        Returns:
        List of header objects with associated file_ids, header name, index, and type.

      • getNumberOfRows

        Parameters:
        inputStream -
        Returns:
